original_title: For Those Who Can Tell No Tales
overview: Kym, an Australian tourist, decides to travel to Bosnia. Her guidebook leads her to Vi≈°egrad, a small town steeped in history, on the border of Bosnia and Serbia. After a night of insomnia in the 'romantic' Hotel Vilina Vlas, Kym discovers what happened there during the war. She can no longer be an ordinary tourist and her life will never be the same again.
title: For Those Who Can Tell No Tales
